results.description: Uses snt_social_value short-term returns as momentum signal. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using primary datafield; SUGGESTION2 not applied because fields are scalar (not vector); SUGGESTION3 not applied because coverage=0.8585 > 0.6; SUGGESTION4 satisfied (high userCount/alphaCount). KEEP_IN_MIND respected: single datafield, simple operator set. Confidence set to 0.70 because short-term sentiment momentum often predicts short alpha but has noise.

Normalize 20-day sentiment to remove scale and pick extremes. Used ts_zscore on snt_social_value. Did not use vec_avg (scalar); coverage high so ts_backfill not needed. Confidence 0.75 due to stability of z-scored signals.

Mean-reversion: current sentiment minus 10-day mean (ts_av_diff). Applied SUGGESTION1 with snt_social_value only; others not applicable. Confidence 0.65 because reversion in sentiment can indicate correction.

Use large sentiment move confirmed by volume increase: ts_returns(snt_social_value,5) multiplied by ts_returns(snt_social_volume,5). SUGGESTION1 applied using both fields; SUGGESTION2 not used; coverage high. Confidence 0.72.

Normalize current sentiment by its 20-day std to control dispersion: divide(snt_social_value, ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,20)). SUGGESTION1 applied single field; ts_backfill not needed. Confidence 0.74.
Detect divergence: subtract(ts_returns(snt_social_value,10), ts_returns(snt_social_volume,10)). Uses both fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.68 since divergence can signal sentiment decoupling.
Identify recent extreme within window: reverse(ts_arg_max(snt_social_value,7)). SUGGESTION1 applied; vec ops not used. Confidence 0.60 — spikes are noisy but actionable.
Sum of recent volume to capture persistent social attention: ts_sum(snt_social_volume,14). Suggestion1 used volume; others not applied. Confidence 0.66 as persistent volume often precedes moves.
Compute information ratio of sentiment returns: ts_ir(ts_returns(snt_social_value,1),20). SUGGESTION1 used value; ts_backfill not needed. Confidence 0.70 due to robust risk-adjusted signal.
Cross-sectional zscore of latest snt_social_value (zscore operator) to pick relative extremes. SUGGESTION1 uses high-alphaCount field; vec not used. Confidence 0.68.
Multiply sentiment by volume to emphasize strong sentiment with high attention (multiply). SUGGESTION1 applied using both fields. Confidence 0.71.
Short-term reversal: reverse(ts_returns(snt_social_value,3)) (negate short returns). SUGGESTION1 used the value field; others not needed. Confidence 0.62.
Scale sentiment within its 60-day range: ts_scale(snt_social_value,60). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.69.
Detect volume surprise: divide(snt_social_volume, ts_mean(snt_social_volume,30)). SUGGESTION1 used volume; high coverage so no backfill. Confidence 0.67.
Compare short vs long std: subtract(ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,10), ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,60)). SUGGESTION1 used value; confidence 0.66 for volatility breakout.

results.idea: Momentum confirmed when sentiment exceeds volume quantile
results.description: Signal when sentiment zscore high and volume in top quantile: multiply(ts_zscore(snt_social_value,20), ts_quantile(snt_social_volume,20)). SUGGESTION1 applied both fields; ts_backfill not needed. Confidence 0.73.
Normalize sentiment by attention: divide(snt_social_value, ts_mean(snt_social_volume,20)). SUGGESTION1 used both fields. Confidence 0.64.
Cross-sectional rank of 5-day sentiment returns to capture leaders/laggers: quantile(ts_returns(snt_social_value,5)). SUGGESTION1 used value; confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by signal reliability (divide by ts_count_nans)
results.description: Penalize signals with sparse recent data: divide(ts_returns(snt_social_value,5), add(ts_count_nans(snt_social_value,5),1)). SUGGESTION3 not needed; SUGGESTION1 used value. Confidence 0.63.
Use ts_delta to measure acceleration vs 7 days ago: ts_delta(snt_social_value,7). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Measure recent correlation between value and volume: ts_corr(snt_social_value, snt_social_volume,30). SUGGESTION1 used both fields. Confidence 0.68.

Zscore of (value - normalized volume) to capture unusual sentiment given attention: ts_zscore(subtract(snt_social_value, ts_scale(snt_social_volume,30)),20). SUGGESTION1 used both fields; operators kept within limit. Confidence 0.70.
Rank sentiment over time for each instrument: ts_rank(snt_social_value,10). SUGGESTION2 not applied (scalar). Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Sentiment kurtosis to find heavy-tailed chatter
results.description: Use ts_kurtosis(snt_social_value,30) to detect abnormal tail events in sentiment distribution. SUGGESTION1 applied; high coverage means stable estimates. Confidence 0.60.

Weighted-like signal: divide(ts_sum(multiply(snt_social_value, snt_social_volume),7), add(ts_sum(snt_social_volume,7),1)) — normalize sentiment by recent volume. SUGGESTION1 used both fields; operators within 7. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Sentiment change vs volume change ratio
results.description: Ratio of recent sentiment change to volume change: divide(ts_delta(snt_social_value,5), add(ts_delta(snt_social_volume,5),1)). SUGGESTION1 used both fields. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: High-confidence buzz: both value and volume zscore high
results.description: Conjunction of high value and high volume zscores: multiply(ts_zscore(snt_social_value,20), ts_zscore(snt_social_volume,20)). SUGGESTION1 used both. Confidence 0.75.
Check if sentiment has peaked before volume: subtract(ts_arg_max(snt_social_value,14), ts_arg_max(snt_social_volume,14)). Positive implies value earlier. SUGGESTION1 used both. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Low-attention value signal (value high when volume low)
results.description: Detect high sentiment with low volume: multiply(ts_zscore(snt_social_value,20), reverse(ts_zscore(snt_social_volume,20))). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Compare current vs 30d mean scaled by std: divide(subtract(snt_social_value, ts_mean(snt_social_value,30)), ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,30)). SUGGESTION1 used value. Confidence 0.69.
Winsorize extreme values then quantile across cross-section: quantile(winsorize(snt_social_value,3)). SUGGESTION1 used; winsorize reduces outliers. Confidence 0.68.
Enhance strong and increasing sentiment: multiply(snt_social_value, ts_returns(snt_social_value,5)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Signal dampening by recent noise (divide by ts_std_dev)
results.description: Dampen signal where sentiment is noisy: divide(ts_zscore(snt_social_value,10), add(ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,10),0.001)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Relative sentiment strength vs peers (zscore of returns)
results.description: Cross-sectional zscore of 20-day returns of sentiment: zscore(ts_returns(snt_social_value,20)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Volume surge followed by sentiment increase
results.description: Signal when volume spikes then sentiment rises: multiply(ts_delta(snt_social_volume,3), ts_delta(snt_social_value,3)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.66.
Winsorize sentiment to reduce outliers then zscore: zscore(winsorize(snt_social_value,4)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.68.
Apply hump to limit turnover on ts_returns: hump(ts_returns(snt_social_value,7), hump=0.02). SUGGESTION1 used; hump reduces trading friction. Confidence 0.64.
Use past sentiment (7d ago) difference: ts_delta(ts_delay(snt_social_value,7),7) effectively current - 7d lag. Simpler: ts_delta(snt_social_value,7). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: High conviction: volume and value both in tails (quantile product)
results.description: Multiply high quantile indicators: multiply(quantile(snt_social_value), quantile(snt_social_volume)). SUGGESTION1 used both fields. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Sentiment momentum normalized by recent median absolute deviation
results.description: Divide short-term returns by ts_std_dev(10) as proxy for MAD: divide(ts_returns(snt_social_value,5), add(ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,10),0.001)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.66.
Subtract median then divide by recent volume: divide(subtract(snt_social_value, ts_mean(snt_social_value,30)), add(ts_mean(snt_social_volume,30),1)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Sentiment persistence score (product of recent returns)
results.description: Product over short window to capture consistent direction: ts_product(ts_returns(snt_social_value,1),5) implemented as ts_product(ts_returns(snt_social_value,1),5). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Contrarian signal: extreme positive sentiment then reverse
results.description: Reverse zscore to go contrarian on extreme positive: reverse(ts_zscore(snt_social_value,30)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Sentiment breakout when value > recent max
results.description: Detect breakout: ts_max_diff(snt_social_value,20) which is current - max(last 20). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.67.
Rank sentiment divided by recent mean volume cross-sectionally: quantile(divide(snt_social_value, add(ts_mean(snt_social_volume,20),1))). SUGGESTION1 used both fields. Confidence 0.68.
Zscore of 14-day delta to find abnormal changes: ts_zscore(ts_delta(snt_social_value,14),14). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.66.
Winsorize 5-day returns then zscore: zscore(winsorize(ts_returns(snt_social_value,5),3)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Sentiment strength relative to volume decile
results.description: Compute decile bucket of volume then multiply by value: multiply(bucket(ts_quantile(snt_social_volume,30)), ts_zscore(snt_social_value,20)). SUGGESTION1 used; bucket uses quantile internally. Confidence 0.63.
Use sign of short returns to keep only direction: sign(ts_returns(snt_social_value,3)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.58 — direction only simpler but less info.
Smooth noisy sentiment by taking 5-day mean of value: ts_mean(snt_social_value,5). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Volume-decay weighted sentiment (decay approximation via ts_mean)
results.description: Approximate decay-weighted sentiment: divide(ts_sum(multiply(snt_social_value, ts_decay_linear(snt_social_volume,7)),7), add(ts_sum(ts_decay_linear(snt_social_volume,7),7),1)). Note: using ts_decay_linear on volume to weight value. SUGGESTION1 used; operators within limit. Confidence 0.70.
Use argmin difference to find sentiment trough before volume trough: subtract(ts_arg_min(snt_social_value,21), ts_arg_min(snt_social_volume,21)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.60.

Only trust signals with low NaN count: trade_when(ts_zscore(snt_social_value,10), greater(ts_count_nans(snt_social_value,10),0), NaN). We use trade_when to gate. SUGGESTION3 not needed; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.55 due to gating risks.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by recent information ratio
results.description: Scale short returns by ts_ir to prefer stable series: multiply(ts_returns(snt_social_value,5), ts_ir(ts_returns(snt_social_value,1),20)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.71.
Use regression slope of sentiment on volume to capture sensitivity: ts_regression(snt_social_value, snt_social_volume,30, lag=0, rettype=0) (slope). SUGGESTION1 used both fields. Confidence 0.66.
Capture secular shifts with long returns: ts_returns(snt_social_value,120). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Short-term reversal confirmed by low volume
results.description: Go contrarian if sentiment spike occurs on low volume: multiply(reverse(ts_zscore(snt_social_value,7)), reverse(ts_zscore(snt_social_volume,7))). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.60.
Multiply sentiment returns by winsorized volume to limit outliers: multiply(ts_returns(snt_social_value,5), winsorize(snt_social_volume,4)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.68.
Product of daily small returns to detect consistent short spikes: ts_product(ts_returns(snt_social_value,1),3). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Subtract cross-sectional mean to produce relative signal: normalize(snt_social_value). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Sentiment momentum where volume in top 10%
results.description: Trade only when volume quantile > 0.9: trade_when(ts_returns(snt_social_value,5), greater(ts_quantile(snt_social_volume,20),0.9), NaN). SUGGESTION1 used both fields. Confidence 0.67.
Use ts_decay_linear-like measure to detect rapid drop via ts_delta and sign: reverse(ts_delta(snt_social_value,3)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.61.
Zero out signals with many NaNs: trade_when(ts_zscore(snt_social_value,15), less(ts_count_nans(snt_social_value,15),5), NaN). SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.56.
Adjust value by recent volume before cross zscore: zscore(divide(snt_social_value, add(ts_mean(snt_social_volume,10),1))). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Sentiment acceleration vs median (ts_av_diff of returns)
results.description: ts_av_diff on 7-day returns captures surprises vs recent average: ts_av_diff(ts_returns(snt_social_value,7),7). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Stable high-signal selection using ts_ir threshold
results.description: Trade when ts_ir of returns > threshold: trade_when(ts_returns(snt_social_value,5), greater(ts_ir(ts_returns(snt_social_value,1),20),0.5), NaN). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Use argmax to detect if current is peak in 5d and convert to binary: if_else(equal(ts_arg_max(snt_social_value,5),0), 1, 0). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by inverse recent volatility
results.description: Multiply short returns by inverse of past std to favor stable moves: multiply(ts_returns(snt_social_value,5), inverse(add(ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,20),0.001))). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Volume breakout followed by sentiment confirmation
results.description: Signal when volume breaks out and sentiment positive: multiply(ts_max_diff(snt_social_volume,20), ts_returns(snt_social_value,3)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.68.
Sum quantiles of value and volume to form composite rank: add(quantile(snt_social_value), quantile(snt_social_volume)). SUGGESTION1 used both fields. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Sentiment momentum after low variance period
results.description: Prefer momentum when recent std low: multiply(ts_returns(snt_social_value,7), inverse(add(ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,30),0.001))). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.69.
Go contrarian if sentiment extreme and volume high: multiply(reverse(zscore(snt_social_value)), ts_quantile(snt_social_volume,10)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.61.
Zero small zscores to reduce churn: tail(ts_zscore(snt_social_value,10), lower=-0.5, upper=0.5, newval=0). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Sentiment leading indicator via ts_arg_max of returns
results.description: Find instruments that had max momentum earlier: ts_arg_max(ts_returns(snt_social_value,5),30). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Combined zscore with winsorize for robustness
results.description: Winsorize value then cross-sectional zscore: zscore(winsorize(snt_social_value,2)). SUGGESTION1 used; reduces tails. Confidence 0.69.

Only consider sentiment acceleration when volume above median: trade_when(ts_delta(snt_social_value,5), greater(snt_social_volume, ts_mean(snt_social_volume,30)), NaN). SUGGESTION1 used both fields. Confidence 0.66.
Compare short vs long std and prefer when ratio small: divide(ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,10), add(ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,60),0.001)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.

zscore of (value / recent max volume) to find unusual sentiment given historical attention: zscore(divide(snt_social_value, add(ts_max(snt_social_volume,30),1))). Note: ts_max used as helper. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.67.
Reverse short returns and damp by volume decay: multiply(reverse(ts_returns(snt_social_value,3)), inverse(add(ts_mean(snt_social_volume,10),1))). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Sentiment dispersion measure using ts_std_dev of returns
results.description: ts_std_dev(ts_returns(snt_social_value,1),20) to measure dispersion of daily moves. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.62.
Add 5d and 20d returns to capture both horizons: add(ts_returns(snt_social_value,5), ts_returns(snt_social_value,20)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Sentiment reversal when volume increases drastically
results.description: If volume surge and sentiment drop then long: multiply(ts_delta(snt_social_volume,3), reverse(ts_delta(snt_social_value,3))). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.62.
Zscore of (5d returns / mean volume) to prefer moves on low attention: zscore(divide(ts_returns(snt_social_value,5), add(ts_mean(snt_social_volume,20),1))). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Signal amplification when both value and volume trend up
results.description: Multiply 20d trends of both fields: multiply(ts_returns(snt_social_value,20), ts_returns(snt_social_volume,20)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Sentiment lead-lag via ts_corr of lagged series
results.description: Compute correlation of value today vs volume lagged 3d to find leading relationship: ts_corr(snt_social_value, ts_delay(snt_social_volume,3),30). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.64.
Binary when current > max of last 7: if_else(greater(ts_max_diff(snt_social_value,7),0),1,0). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.61.
Winsorize returns then divide by long std: divide(winsorize(ts_returns(snt_social_value,5),3), add(ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,60),0.001)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.66.
Subtract percentile-ranked volume from percentile-ranked value to get contrast: subtract(quantile(snt_social_value), quantile(snt_social_volume)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Stable positive sentiment filter (positive & low std)
results.description: Positive zscore and low short std: if_else(and(greater(ts_zscore(snt_social_value,20),0), less(ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,10), ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,60))), ts_zscore(snt_social_value,20), NaN). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.63.
Divide sentiment variance by volume to find noisy low-attention names: divide(ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,20), add(ts_mean(snt_social_volume,20),1)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.59.
Average zscores of short and medium horizons: divide(add(ts_zscore(snt_social_value,5), ts_zscore(snt_social_value,20)),2). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.67.
Multiply sentiment returns by positive volume trend indicator: multiply(ts_returns(snt_social_value,7), if_else(greater(ts_returns(snt_social_volume,7),0),1,0)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Short-term sentiment cycle detection (ts_arg_min then reverse)
results.description: If current is recent trough then long: if_else(equal(ts_arg_min(snt_social_value,10),0), 1, 0). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Signal robustness via winsorize and normalize
results.description: Winsorize then normalize cross-sectionally: normalize(winsorize(snt_social_value,3)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.68.
Rank time-series but scale by recent volume: multiply(ts_rank(snt_social_value,10), ts_mean(snt_social_volume,10)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Sentiment surprise index (current - kth valid past)
results.description: Use kth_element to get last valid then subtract: subtract(snt_social_value, kth_element(snt_social_value,30,1)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Momentum throttled by hump to reduce turnover
results.description: Apply hump to 10d returns to limit overtrading: hump(ts_returns(snt_social_value,10), hump=0.01). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Persistent attention filter (high sum volume & positive sentiment)
results.description: Multiply 30d volume sum by positive sentiment indicator: multiply(ts_sum(snt_social_volume,30), if_else(greater(snt_social_value, ts_mean(snt_social_value,30)),1,0)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.67.
Signals when short-term zscore deviates from long-term: subtract(ts_zscore(snt_social_value,5), ts_zscore(snt_social_value,60)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.64.

Flag when value quantile > 0.95 but volume quantile < 0.5 (possible thin-market hype): if_else(and(greater(quantile(snt_social_value),0.95), less(quantile(snt_social_volume),0.5)), 1, 0). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Sentiment momentum combined (average of returns & zscore)
results.description: Average of 7d returns and 7d zscore to blend price-less signals: divide(add(ts_returns(snt_social_value,7), ts_zscore(snt_social_value,7)),2). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Volume shock followed by sentiment stabilization
results.description: Detect volume shock and then look for sentiment stabilization: multiply(ts_max_diff(snt_social_volume,10), ts_std_dev(snt_social_value,5)). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.60.
